author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
title: How to connect a Nest Thermostat to Apple Home through Matter
description: The Nest Thermostat now works with Apple Home thanks to Matter. Follow this guide to set up and control Google’s smart thermostat in the Apple Home app.
